org.pipservices.runtime.IComponent

    • Uses of IComponent in org.pipservices.runtime

      Subinterfaces of IComponent in org.pipservices.runtime 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IAddon
      Addons are microservice extensions that are not directly participate in handling business transactions.
      interface  IBootConfig
      Interface for microservice component that is responsible for reading bootstrap microservice configuration from a configuration repository.
      interface  IBusinessLogic
      Interface for components that implement microservice business logic: controllers or decorators.
      interface  ICache
      Transient cache which is used to bypass persistence to increase overall system performance.
      interface  IClient
      Interface for clients to other microservices or infrastructure services.
      interface  IController
      Interface for microservice components that encapsulate business logic.
      interface  ICounters
      Interface for performance counters.
      interface  IDecorator
      Decorators are used to inject custom behavior into existing microservice.
      interface  IDiscovery
      Service discovery component used to register addresses of the microservice service endpoints or to resolve addresses of external services called by clients.
      interface  ILogger
      Logger that logs messages from other microservice components.
      interface  IPersistence
      Interface for microservice persistent components that are responsible for storing and retrieving data.
      interface  IService
      Interface for API service components that expose microservice operations for external clients.
      Classes in org.pipservices.runtime that implement IComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractComponent
      Abstract implementation for all microservice components.
      Methods in org.pipservices.runtime that return IComponent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IComponent IComponentFactory.create(ComponentDescriptor descriptor)
      Create a component instance using class located by component descriptor.
      IComponent ComponentSet.getOneOptional(ComponentDescriptor descriptor)
      Finds the a single component instance (the first one) that matches to the specified descriptor.
      IComponent ComponentSet.getOnePrior(IComponent component, ComponentDescriptor descriptor)
      Gets a component instance that matches the specified descriptor defined before specified instance.
      IComponent ComponentSet.getOneRequired(ComponentDescriptor descriptor)
      Gets a component instance that matches the specified descriptor.
      Methods in org.pipservices.runtime that return types with arguments of type IComponent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<IComponent> ComponentSet.getAllByCategory(String category)
      Gets a sublist of component references from specific category.
      List<IComponent> ComponentSet.getAllOptional(ComponentDescriptor descriptor)
      Finds all components that match specified descriptor.
      List<IComponent> ComponentSet.getAllOrdered()
      Gets a list with all component references sorted in strict initialization order: Discovery, Logs, Counters, Cache, Persistence, Controller, ...
      List<IComponent> ComponentSet.getAllRequired(ComponentDescriptor descriptor)
      Gets all components that match specified descriptor.
      List<IComponent> ComponentSet.getAllUnordered()
      Get a list of components in random order.
      Methods in org.pipservices.runtime with parameters of type IComponent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ComponentSet.add(IComponent component)
      Adds a single component to the list
      static ComponentSet ComponentSet.fromComponents(IComponent... components)
      Creates a component list from components passed as params
      IComponent ComponentSet.getOnePrior(IComponent component, ComponentDescriptor descriptor)
      Gets a component instance that matches the specified descriptor defined before specified instance.
      Method parameters in org.pipservices.runtime with type arguments of type IComponent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ComponentSet.addAll(List<? extends IComponent> components)
      Adds multiple components to the list
      Constructors in org.pipservices.runtime with parameters of type IComponent 
      Constructor and Description
      ComponentSet(IComponent[] components)
      Creates a component list and fills with component references from component array.
      Constructor parameters in org.pipservices.runtime with type arguments of type IComponent 
      Constructor and Description
      ComponentSet(List<? extends IComponent> components)
      Creates a component list and fills with component references from another list.

      class  AbstractBootConfig
      Abstract implementation for all configuration reader components.
      class  FileBootConfig
      Configuration reader that gets microservice configuration from JSON file on local disk.

    • Uses of IComponent in org.pipservices.runtime.cache

      Classes in org.pipservices.runtime.cache that implement IComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractCache
      Abstract implementation for transient cache.
      class  MemoryCache
      Local in-memory cache that can be used in non-scaled deployments or for testing.
      class  NullCache
      Null cache component that doesn't do caching at all.

      class  AbstractClient
      Abstract implementation for all microservice client components.
      class  DirectClient
      Direct client implementation that allows to call another microservice from the same container.
      class  RestClient

    • Uses of IComponent in org.pipservices.runtime.counters

      Classes in org.pipservices.runtime.counters that implement IComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractCounters 
      class  LogCounters
      Performance counters component that periodically dumps counters to log as message: 'Counter {"type": , "last": , ...}
      class  NullCounters
      Performance counters component that doesn't calculate or do anything.

      class  AbstractBusinessLogic
      Abstract implementation for all microservice business logic components that are able to perform business functions (commands).

      Abstract implementation for all API service components
